FuncDef: This command specifies the time interval (in s), that LDP waits before posting a tunnel down event to the Tunnel Table Manager (TTM).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time interval (in s), that LDP waits before posting a tunnel down event to the Tunnel Table Manager.

ExtraInfo: Default: no tunnel-down-damp-time (which equals a value of 3 seconds)
